body: Okay. I think I solved it. Looks like the shared memory of the docker container wasn't set high enough. Setting a higher amount by adding `--shm-size 8G` to the `docker run` command seems to be the trick as [mentioned here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/1355#issuecomment-308587289). Let me fully test it, if solved I'll close issue.
